titleStmt.title: The royall exchange. A comedy, acted with general applause at the Black-Friers, by His Majesties Servants. Written by Mr. Richard Brome.
titleStmt.author: Brome, Richard, d. 1652?

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Brome at the Gun in Ivie-lane,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The queens exchange.
A reissue, with cancel title page, of: The queenes exchange.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
